message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
I'll give you a chance to reconsider the 60-40 split, but I think I deserve a bit more for taking the risk of negotiating with you!
I'll give you a bit more, but I think 55-45 is a fair compromise!
You're getting closer, but I think I deserve a bit more for my patience. This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
I'm willing to meet you halfway, 50-50, let's end this!
